# title

**Instance Property**

The title of the location.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String? { get set }
```

## Accessing Structured Location Properties

- **geoLocation**: The core location.
- **radius**: A minimum distance from the core location that would trigger the alarm or reminder.

items.description: A minimum distance from the core location that would trigger the alarm or reminder.
items.name: radius

title: title
